did.unittitle: Hartford Journeymen Plumbers and Apprentices, Local 76 Records
did.abstract: This local was originally chartered on 1 March 1893 as Local 76 of the United Association of Journeymen Plumbers, Gas Fitters, Steamfitters and Steamfitters Helpers of the United States and Canada.

bioghist.head: History
bioghist.p: This local was originally chartered on 1 March 1893 as Local 76 of the United Association of Journeymen Plumbers, Gas Fitters, Steamfitters and Steamfitters Helpers of the United States and Canada. Local 76 is located in Hartford, Connecticut, and represents Hartford area plumbers and steamfitters.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection includes minutes (which also include reports of the officers, financial reports, sick reports), correspondence, bylaws and working rules, strike assessments, membership dues payments and travel reimbursements.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Series I: Minutes (1909-1954) contains minute books of the regular membership meetings of Local 76. Minutes include reports of the officers, financial reports, sick reports, and correspondence with other locals. These minutes are organized chronologically.

Series II: Administrative Records (1950-1983) includes a 1983 revision of Local 76's Bylaws and Working Rules, a 1950 Agreement and Declaration of Trust between Local 76 and the Association of Master Plumbers of Hartford, strike assessments for the July to September 1968 strike, correspondence and reports. This material is arranged by type.

Series III: Dues Records (1919-1970) is arranged in two sub-series. Dues Ledgers (1919-1968) contains records of membership dues payments and travel reimbursements. There are several gaps in this sub-series: 1951-1954, 1957-1958, 1961-1962, 1965-1966. Collection Sheets and Cash Receipts (1960-1970) served as another form of recording dues payments. All material is arranged chronologically.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to publish from these Papers must be obtained in writing from the owner(s) of the copyright.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Item description, #:#], United Association Of Plumbers And Steamfitters Of the United States And Canada, Hartford Journeymen Plumbers And Apprentices, Local 76 Records. Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Library.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The records were deposited in the Connecticut Labor Archives 1n April 1984 by Patrick Quinn, Business Agent.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open and available for research.
